articles.description: Google is now taking its Gemini AI model and the features to the Chromebook lineup, giving people a cheaper alternative to Windows AI PCs.
articles.content: Google is taking AI to more of its hardware products this week, and the next stop for the company is the Chromebook. Thats right, the ChromeOS powered machines are now getting support for the latest … [+1499 chars]
